Properties.Name: type
Properties.HelpText: The type of the door. 0 for regular doors, 1 for big containment doors found in most containment chambers, 2 for Heavy Containment Zone doors, 3 for elevator doors.

Properties.Name: keycard
Properties.HelpText: The level of keycard required to open this door or 0 for no key card. -1 corresponds to the white severed hand, -2 to the black severed hand. Mutually exclusive with Keypad Code.

Properties.Name: code
Properties.HelpText: A numeric four digit code (longer or non-numeric codes render the door unopenable) or an empty string for no code. Mutually exclusive with Key Card Level.

Properties.Name: angle
Properties.HelpText: The yaw rotation of the door.

Properties.Name: open
Properties.HelpText: Whether the door should spawn open.

Properties.Name: allowremotecontrol
Properties.HelpText: Allow SCP-079 to remotely close the door in front of the player if the remote door control system is enabled.
